testcase.name: Scale Operations UI Screenshots › 07 - Preview results display
testcase.system-out: Note: Preview results require backend. Screenshot shows ready state.

testcase.name: Scale Operations UI Screenshots › 08 - Progress monitor during operation
testcase.system-out: Note: Progress monitor requires running operation. Consider mocking backend responses.
